start      - local timestamp in ISO format

order      - asc/desc
resolution - live/quarterhour/hour/day/month
include    - used to include various reading details
cost - show cost for the reading

get.description:
Supported GET params: (all optional)
start      - local timestamp in ISO format
end        - local timestamp in ISO format
order      - asc/desc

post.description:
Post data for Work Order Tasks via Work Order Gateway to BuildingOS

Unique Fields:
A Work Order Task is unique based on gateway, taskId, and workOrderId.

Required Fields (all others are optional):
Top Level:
* gateway
* workOrders: Array of Work Order Tasks

Work Order Task Level:
* taskId
* taskProblemType
* buildingId
* buildingName

Work Order Cost Level:
* costId
* date
* type
* cost
post.summary: Post data for Work Order Tasks via Work Order Gateway to BuildingOS
